dt: {bc}something within or from which something else originates, develops, or takes form

dt.t: an atmosphere of understanding and friendliness that is the {wi}matrix{/wi} of peace

dt: {bc}a mold from which a relief {dx_def}see {dxt|relief:1||6}{/dx_def} surface (such as a piece of type) is made
{bc}an engraved or inscribed die {dx_def}see {dxt|die:2||3}{/dx_def} or stamp
{bc}an {d_link|electroformed|electroform} impression of a {d_link|phonograph|phonograph} record used for mass-producing duplicates of the original
{bc}the natural material (such as soil or rock) in which something (such as a fossil or crystal) is embedded
{bc}material in which something is enclosed or embedded (as for protection or study)
{bc}the {d_link|extracellular|extracellular} substance in which tissue cells (as of {d_link|connective tissue|connective tissue}) are embedded
{bc}the thickened {d_link|epithelium|epithelium} at the base of a fingernail or toenail from which new nail substance develops

{bc}a rectangular array {dx_def}see {dxt|array:2||5}{/dx_def} of mathematical elements (such as the coefficients {dx_def}see {dxt|coefficient||1}{/dx_def} of simultaneous {dx_def}see {dxt|simultaneous||2}{/dx_def} {d_link|linear equations|linear equation}) that can be combined to form sums and products with similar arrays having an appropriate number of rows and columns
{bc}something resembling a mathematical matrix especially in rectangular arrangement of elements into rows and columns
{bc}an array of circuit elements (such as {d_link|diodes|diode} and {d_link|transistors|transistor}) for performing a specific function
{bc}a main {dx_def}see {dxt|main:2||5}{/dx_def} clause that contains a subordinate {dx_def}see {dxt|subordinate:1||}{/dx_def} clause

et: Latin, female animal used for breeding, parent plant, from {it}matr-, mater{/it}
shortdef: something within or from which something else originates, develops, or takes form
a mold from which a relief surface (such as a piece of type) is made

dt: {bc}a matrix whose elements are the coefficients of a set of simultaneous linear equations with the constant terms of the equations entered in an added column

shortdef: a matrix whose elements are the coefficients of a set of simultaneous linear equations with the constant terms of the equations entered in an added column

dt: {bc}a pattern of dots in a grid from which alphanumeric characters can be formed

shortdef: a pattern of dots in a grid from which alphanumeric characters can be formed

dt: {bc}a square matrix having the property that each pair of elements in the {it}i{/it}th row and {it}j{/it}th column and in the {it}j{/it}th row and {it}i{/it}th column are conjugate complex numbers

shortdef: a square matrix having the property that each pair of elements in the ith row and jth column and in the jth row and ith column are conjugate complex numbers

dt: {bc}a square matrix that has numeral 1's along the principal diagonal and 0's elsewhere

shortdef: a square matrix that has numeral 1's along the principal diagonal and 0's elsewhere

dt: {bc}a matrix that is its own transpose
